name: JumpoWheels
description:
JumpoWheels - By Ahmed Hamdi

Hello there driver. Its time you take a ride in a car and use your jumping skills to reach the finishline. Hope that you, driver, might enjoy the experience. Ok then driver, download the game to get started.

Controls AccelerateUp ArrowWNumpad 8Braking / ReverseDown Arrow SNumpad 5Steer LeftLeft ArrowANumpad 4Steer RightRight ArrowDNumpad 6Jump Spacebar
